New Records: Quinton de Kock became the sixth batter to score three hundreds in a single edition of the tournament and also overtook Virat Kohli as the highest run-getter (407)
Key Match Events: South Africa scored 382 for five and handed a 149-run defeat to Bangladesh
Miscellaneous Highlights: South Africa plundered 144 off the last ten overs
The match saw a mammoth 382 total score by South Africa
